org.elasticsearch.action.admin.cluster.node.stats

类 NodesStatsRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportMessage
      • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportRequest
        • org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest
          • org.elasticsearch.action.support.nodes.BaseNodesRequest<NodesStatsRequest>
            • org.elasticsearch.action.admin.cluster.node.stats.NodesStatsRequest
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Streamable, TaskAwareRequest

    public class NodesStatsRequest
extends BaseNodesRequest<NodesStatsRequest>
    A request to get node (cluster) level stats.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportRequest

    • 构造器详细资料

      • NodesStatsRequest

        public NodesStatsRequest()

      • NodesStatsRequest

        public NodesStatsRequest(java.lang.String... nodesIds)
        Get stats from nodes based on the nodes ids specified. If none are passed, stats for all nodes will be returned.
